reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is very knowledgeable and her lectures are clear. However, her exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Smith is excellent! His explanations are simple and easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Lee knows her stuff, but sometimes the lectures are too fast-paced.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Brown is engaging and makes history interesting.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is a bit disorganized, and it's hard to follow her lectures.

reviews.subject: English
reviews.review: Prof. Miller is fantastic! He really cares about his students and their progress.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson explains complex concepts well but expects a lot from her students.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor is great at breaking down difficult topics and is always willing to help.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Anderson is very knowledgeable, but her classes can be a bit dry.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Prof. Thomas is insightful and his lectures are engaging.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is passionate about art and her enthusiasm is contagious.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Prof. Jackson is a great lecturer, but his exams are challenging.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. White's lectures are informative, but sometimes a bit too detailed.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Harris is amazing! His classes are both informative and thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is very clear in her explanations, but there's a lot of material to cover.

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Prof. Lewis is an inspiring teacher and makes learning music theory enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Walker is knowledgeable, but her teaching style is not very effective.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Prof. Hall's classes are interesting, and he incorporates a lot of real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Law
reviews.review: Dr. Young is brilliant and her classes are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Prof. King is good, but sometimes the lectures are a bit too theoretical.
